ResearchProjectDef.label: Malevolent mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: As we conduct further studies on the remnants of the Apocriton, the full picture of the Rust Wars gradually comes to light.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Through the study of Apocriton remnants, the full scope of the Rust Wars is unveiled. We will cast a reflection of the past to forge an astounding future.hrough the study of Apocriton remnants, the full scope of the Rust Wars is unveiled. We will cast a reflection of the past to forge an astounding future.
